programme.title: Manchester United vs Olympique Lyonnais - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Quater Finals 2nd Leg
programme.desc: This will be the first season whereby the UEFA Europa League will be played under a new format, which replaces the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. The new format also does not allow teams to transfer from the Champions League knockout stage to the Europa League knockout stage. The final will be played on 21 May 2025 at San Mames stadium in Bilbao, Spain.All matches are live and exclusive only on beIN.

programme.title: Cesson vs PSG - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germains 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Morocco vs Cote D’ivoire - CAF U17 Africa Cup of Nations Morocco 2025 1/2 Final
programme.desc: The 2025 U-17 Africa Cup of Nations is the 15th edition of the biennial African youth football tournament organized by Confederation of African Football (CAF) for players aged 17 and below. Morocco was chosen as the host of this edition The top 10 teams will qualify for the 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup in Qatar as the CAF representatives. It is the first U-17 Africa Cup of Nations to feature 16 teams. Senegal are the defending champions.

programme.title: Stefanos TSITSIPAS (GRE) vs Sebastian KORDA (USA) - Barcelona Open - BancSabadell 2025 - ATP 500
programme.desc: The 2025 Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell (ATP 500) runs from April 14–20 at the Real Club de Tenis Barcelona. With a reduced 32-player draw, top names like Carlos Alcaraz, Tsitsipas, and Ruud headline the clay-court event. This edition also marks the first without Rafael Nadal and includes a tribute to Bjorn Borg on the 50th anniversary of his 1975 win.

With a reduced 32-player draw, top names like Carlos Alcaraz, Tsitsipas, and Ruud headline the clay-court event. This edition also marks the first without Rafael Nadal and includes a tribute to Bjorn Borg on the 50th anniversary of his 1975 win.

programme.title: A Special Interview with Three Arab Tennis Stars
programme.desc: An exclusive joint interview featuring three rising Arab tennis talents — Hady Habib (Lebanon), Abdullah Shelbayh (Jordan), and Aziz Dougaz (Tunisia) — as they share their stories, ambitions, and experiences during their participation in the ATP 500 Qatar ExxonMobil Open 2025. In this candid conversation, the players reflect on their personal journeys, the challenges of representing their countries on the global stage, and their hopes for the future of Arab tennis.

programme.title: One Friday Fight - 104
programme.desc: ONE Championship returns to Bangkok with a stacked card headlined by Chartpayak vs. Kompet, a high-stakes Muay Thai clash with six-figure contract implications. Also featuring Sonrak vs. Khunponnoi and 10 more explosive bouts across Muay Thai, MMA, and kickboxing.

programme.title: Qatar Prix de lArc de Triomphe 2024 Highlight
programme.desc: The Qatar Arc de Triomphe Horse Racing Festival is considered one of the strongest races in the world, in which the most famous owners in the world, the best horses, the best trainers and the strongest riders participate. The horse Al Ghadeer was able to continue his successive victories, awaiting the crowning with the Triple Crown in the Emir of Qatar Sword in February 2025 after his victory in Qatar Goodwood and the Arc de Triomphe in Paris.

programme.title: My Faith in Sport - Sawm
programme.desc: Ramadan is a crucial period in the Islamic calendar but fasting (Sawm) can provide complications for athletes who are trying to compete at the highest level. But to what extent is fasting a negative or can it actually aid performance? We look at the life and adaptation throughout Ramadan of Adam Azim – an unbeaten professional boxer from the UK, Fares El Bakh – a weightlifter who won Qatar’s first ever Olympic gold medal, and Zainab Alema – a rugby player who is aiming to become the first player to represent England wearing a hijab. Experts in Sports Science and Nutrition from Aspetar Clinic, Qatar also add detail of the physical impact athletes encounter during Ramadan.

programme.title: EPL Stories 2024/25 - Philippe Coutinho
programme.desc: We take a look at the career of Philippe Coutinho, tracing his journey from a promising young talent to one of the Premier Leagues most skilful and dynamic players. We Join Coutinho at his current club Vasco da Gama and reflect on his time In Europe, from his rise at Liverpool to his time at Barcelona, Bayern Munich and Aston Villa. Delving into his passion, creativity, and legacy, we celebrate how his flair and vision have left a lasting mark on the Premier League.

programme.title: EPL The Big Interview 2024/25 - Mikel Merino
programme.desc: It was the goal that made the footballing world stand up and take notice of Mikel Merino. In scoring the winner for Spain in the semi-finals of Euro 2024, his celebration paid homage to his father, who performed the same Iconic dance in the exact same stadium 33 years previously. This week on the Big Interview, Merino explains how his father has Inspired him, the influence hes taken from Basque culture, his surprise at finding out hed be playing as a striker at Arsenal and his thoughts on his first season in North London.

The final will be played on 21 May 2025 at San Mames stadium in Bilbao, Spain.

programme.title: My Faith in Sport - Taffakur
programme.desc: Islam teaches Muslims about ‘Tawakkul’ meaning trusting in God’s plan. programme.title: Practice 1 - F1 KSA Round Grand Prix - 2025
programme.desc: beIN SPORTS is the live and exclusive broadcast partners of Formula 1 until end of 2033 season. The 2025 Formula One season will feature 10 teams, 20 drivers, and a record 24 races across 21 countries, marking the championships 75th anniversary. All race weekends, including every Practice, Qualifying, Sprint and Race will be live and exclusive on beIN.

programme.title: EPL Stories 2024/25 - Philippe Coutinho
programme.desc: We take a look at the career of Philippe Coutinho, tracing his journey from a promising young talent to one of the Premier Leagues most skilful and dynamic players. We Join Coutinho at his current club Vasco da Gama and reflect on his time In Europe, from his rise at Liverpool to his time at Barcelona, Bayern Munich and Aston Villa. Delving into his passion, creativity, and legacy, we celebrate how his flair and vision have left a lasting mark on the Premier League.

programme.title: Qualifying - FIA Formula 2 Championship -KSA Round
programme.desc: The 2025 FIA Formula 2 Championship is an open-wheel racing category serving as the second tier of formula racing in the FIA Global Pathway. The category will be run in support of selected rounds of the 2025 Formula One World Championship. As the championship is a spec series, all teams and drivers competing in the championship will run the same car, the new Dallara F2 2024. Invicta Racing are the reigning Teams Champions.

programme.title: Bundesliga Weekly 2024/25
programme.desc: Weekly magazine containing exclusive interviews, as well as the best goals from the weekends matches.

programme.title: EPL The Big Interview 2024/25 - Mikel Merino
programme.desc: It was the goal that made the footballing world stand up and take notice of Mikel Merino. In scoring the winner for Spain in the semi-finals of Euro 2024, his celebration paid homage to his father, who performed the same Iconic dance in the exact same stadium 33 years previously. This week on the Big Interview, Merino explains how his father has Inspired him, the influence hes taken from Basque culture, his surprise at finding out hed be playing as a striker at Arsenal and his thoughts on his first season in North London.

programme.title: La Liga Show 2024/25
programme.desc: La Liga Show is an exciting magazine series that features a great combination of highlights and exclusive interviews in a superb weekly package

programme.title: Qualifying - F1 Academy 2025 - KSA Round
programme.desc: F1 ACADEMY is the all-female driver category that develops and prepares young drivers to progress to the highest levels of the sport. F1 ACADEMY will race at seven Grands Prix across three continents in the 2025 season and will be central to beIN’s women’s sports portfolio.

programme.title: UEL/UECL Highlights 2024/25 - Quarterfinals 2nd leg
programme.desc: The UEFA Europa League and UEFA Conference league as well as the UEFA Champions League are live and exclusive only on beIN. Season 2024 -2025 will be the first season all UEFA club tournaments are played under a new format. For the UEFA Europa League a 36-team league phase replaces the 32-team group stage. The final will be played on 21 May 2025 at San Mames stadium in Bilbao, Spain.

programme.title: EPL Welcome to the Weekend 2024/25
programme.desc: Light-hearted, inclusive and entertaining, Welcome to the Weekend is the show that kicks off the Premier League weekend. We will focus on the football but also on the lifestyle topics that footballers and fans love - whether it’s food and family, music and movies, or fashion and gaming. The On-Screen Team will bring chemistry, energy and a load of fun.

programme.title: Fiorentina vs Celje - UEFA Europa Conference League 2024/25 - Quarter Final 2nd Leg
programme.desc: The 2024–25 season will be the first UEFA Conference League played under a new format involving a 36-team league stage. The new format also does not allow teams to transfer from the Europa League to the Conference League knockout stage. The final will be played in Stadion Wrocław in Poland. All matches are live and exclusive only on beIN.

programme.title: Match 1 - ATP 500 - Munich - BMW OPEN - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 BMW Open in Munich makes its debut as an ATP 500 event, elevating its status on the professional tennis calendar. Held on the clay courts of MTTC Iphitos, the tournament features a 32-player singles draw and offers enhanced facilities, including a new 6,500-seat center court. This marks a significant step forward for one of Germany’s most historic and prestigious tennis events.

programme.title: Tourcoing vs Poitiers - Marmara Spike ligue Volleyball 2024
programme.desc: The LNV Ligue A Masculine (LAM), currently known as the Marmara SpikeLigue for sponsorship reasons, is the top-tier mens volleyball league in France, established in 1938. Governed by the Ligue Nationale de Volley (LNV) under the French Volleyball Federation (FFVB), the league features Frances elite volleyball talent. Formerly called Pro A until 2009, it shares a rich history and prestige akin to its basketball counterpart.

programme.title: Limoges vs Nantes - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germains 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Qatar Prix de lArc de Triomphe 2024 Highlight
programme.desc: The Qatar Arc de Triomphe Horse Racing Festival is considered one of the strongest races in the world, in which the most famous owners in the world, the best horses, the best trainers and the strongest riders participate. The horse Al Ghadeer was able to continue his successive victories, awaiting the crowning with the Triple Crown in the Emir of Qatar Sword in February 2025 after his victory in Qatar Goodwood and the Arc de Triomphe in Paris.

programme.title: World Sailing Show 2025
programme.desc: The World Sailing Show 2025 brings you the most thrilling moments from elite sailing competitions around the globe. programme.title: Main Race - Seville Marathon 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Zurich Maraton de Sevilla is set to celebrate its 40th anniversary on Sunday, February 23 in Seville, Spain. Renowned for its flat and fast course, the event has become a favorite among elite and amateur runners alike.
